## Create an RMarkdown document  

Use the RMarkdown cheat sheet and create an .Rmd with the following:

1. A picture  
2. A 3x5 table
3. A few sentences that use bold and italic formatting   
4. A bulleted list  
5. A numbered list  
6. A link to a website  
7. Multiple sized headers. 
8. A superscript and subscript. 
9. An equation 
10. Plain text within fencing
